words.meaning: adj. 오래된, 낡은, 나이가 든, 늙은
adj. 뒤의, adv. 뒤로, 뒤에, n. 뒤

words.example: A tiger lives in the jungle.
We sit in the living room.

words.meaning: v. (자전거·차 등을) 타다, n. 타기, 탈 것

words.example: Stand in front of the door.
The cat is behind the box.
The book is on the desk.
My house is near the park.

words.meaning: n. 드레스, 원피스, v. 옷을 입다

words.example: The cat is under the table.

words.meaning: adj. 첫, 처음의, adv. 우선, 먼저

words.exampleMeaning: 나는 내 이름을 쓸 수 있어.

words.meaning: n. 맨 위, 꼭대기, adj. 맨 위의

words.example: The cow is in the barn.
Put the toy into the box.

words.meaning: n. 기체, 가스, (난방·조리용) 가스, 휘발유, 기름
n. 안, 내부, adv. 안으로, 안에

words.example: I am 8 years old this year.

words.meaning: n. 장소, 곳, v. 두다, 놓다
adv. 일찍, 빨리, adj. 이른, 빠른

words.example: I plant a seed in the garden.
I sleep with a warm blanket.
The penguin waddles on the ice.
I throw trash in the bin.

words.meaning: v. 떠나다, 출발하다, 남기다, 놓고 가다

words.example: My plate is full of food.
I share my snacks with friends.
The star shines in the sky.
I borrow books from the library.
The cat hides behind the sofa.

words.exampleMeaning: 나는 차를 만들기 위해 물을 끓인다.

words.example: Brushing my teeth is a good habit.
I drink milk from a mug.
The goldfish swims in the fishbowl.
The lizard runs on the rock.
The picture hangs on the wall.
I was the last one to finish.
We laugh at the funny joke.
I make a pot with clay.
My dad has a new job.
The dog sticks out its tongue.
We stand in a straight line.

words.meaning: v. 싸우다, 다투다, n. 싸움, 다툼
words.example: The boys fight over a toy.
I worry about my test tomorrow.
I drink water from a glass.
I call my friend on the telephone.
She is the winner of the race.
I unlock the door with a key.

words.exampleMeaning: 내 급우는 내가 공부하는 것을 돕는다.

words.example: I invite my friends to my party.
We have a quiz in class.
I buy a book at the bookstore.
I throw the ball to my friend.
I light a candle at night.
The dragon flies in the story.
I sit on the side of the table.
The bell makes a loud sound.
The bird is free in the sky.
I wear a mask at the party.
I make a necklace with beads.
I scream when I see a spider.
I carry my bag to school.
I lie on the soft bed.
The dog sleeps in the corner.
I send a postcard to my friend.
I watch a show on television.
I choose a seat by the window.

words.meaning: n. (도로로 나뉘는) 구역, v. 막다, 방해하다

words.example: I solve a puzzle with friends.
I am scared of the dark.
I hurry to catch the bus.
I tear the paper by mistake.
I try to draw a star.

words.meaning: adv. 제발, 부디, v. 기쁘게 하다
n. 붓, 빗, v. 빗질하다, 닦다

words.example: I save my money in a piggy bank.
The ladybug lands on a leaf.
My shoes get dirty in the mud.
I am bored without my friends.
I count the stars at night.
The flower will die without water.
I turn left at the corner.
The grass is soft and green.
I play a game on the computer.

words.meaning: v. 돌다, 돌리다, n. 차례, 순서
words.example: I turn the page in my book.
The tin is full of cookies.
The flag waves in the wind.
My hands are dirty with dirt.
The crocodile swims in the river.
I pack my bag for school.
